title: Synergistic effects of nudges and boosts in environmental education: Evidence from a field experiment
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 224

Author(s): Kengo Igei, Hirofumi Kurokawa, Masato Iseki, Akinori Kitsuki, Kenichi Kurita, Shunsuke Managi, Makiko Nakamuro, Akira Sakano
